column1: Smoque BBQ////I think the long lines at this new downtown location can be attributed to the novelty of having a BBQ place handy
column2: and the fact that it DOES smell good (they must be pumping the smoke out into the restaurant
column3: because very little actually gets into the meat).  But it IS overpriced ($8+ for less meat than you'd get in a decent burger) and my guess is that those lines will taper off pretty soon
column4: once folks twig to that.  I'd gladly pay more for better BBQ
column5: and while this isn't (exactly) a rip-off
column6: it's definitely a case of getting LESS than you paid for....
